titles: Mr. Geo. Withers revived, or, His prophesie of our present calamity, and (except we repent) future misery written by him in the year 1628.
author: Wither, George, 1588-1667.
notes: Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
An extract from the author's Britains remembrancer, 1628.
keywords: Great Britain --  History --  Puritan Revolution, 1642-1660 --  Poetry.
